mapper.select: SELECT p.user_id, p.id, u.name, u.surname, u.email, u.personal_id, p.degree FROM users u JOIN professors p on u.id = p.user_id and p.id = #{id}
SELECT p.user_id, p.id, u.name, u.surname, u.email, u.personal_id, p.degree FROM users u RIGHT JOIN professors p on u.id = p.user_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users u JOIN professors p on u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users u JOIN professors p on u.id = p.user_id SET u.name = #{professor.name}, u.surname = #{professor.surname}, u.email = #{professor.email}, u.personal_id = #{professor.personalId}, p.degree = #{professor.degree} WHERE u.id = #{id}
